interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Oreola Fish Line Hair Extensions Real Human Hair Natural Black Wire Hair Extensions Straight Hairpiece for Women #1B 20inch 120G Review Date: 2021/09/17 Store: Oreola Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Oreola', 'Color': '#1B Natural Black', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '20 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Package Dimensions': '7.87 x 3.94 x 1.97 inches; 8 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Oreola'} Review Text: This is a great option to the expensive hand tied extensions, plus you can put them in and off when you want.
The hair is soft and shinny, feel very good quality. It hold very good straightening or curling iron.
The weft has clippers so it can be more secure to the head. And the wire is adjustable to the size and shape of your head.
It is not extremely heavy, but you can feel it when you first put it on, but after a couple of hours you don’t even remember is there.
I saw quite a few videos to install it correctly and that made the difference so it can be completely invisible.
Comfortable to wear, the weft is not itchy.
The pack comes with the hair in a dust bag, a comb and a hair pin.
Recommended. Review Title: Super soft and shinny hair Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
6 Pack Soft Headband BEoffer Coral Fleece Women Makeup Spa Head Bands Turban Fashion Bow Bowknot Hairlace Headwear Wash Face Hair Holder Elastic Top Knot Bandage Girl Baby Hair Accessories 6 Colors BEoffer {'Age Range (Description)': 'Baby', 'Material': 'Elastic', 'Fabric Type': 'Fleece', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Face Makeup', 'Product Dimensions': '7.28 x 1.97 x 0.67 inches; 1.16 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'BH-002', 'UPC': '799899729252'} I love this set! Even though I don’t need 6 of them.
They are well made, very stretchy, so I guess they fit a wide range of head sizes!
Super super soft. The fabric is thick.
Comfortable to use, it does not squeeze the head. But it holds all the hair back.
I use it when washing my face. It keeps my hair dry too.
I love the bow! Very 50’s!!!
Great colors. Like it a lot. Fun and works great! Bioré J-Beauty Makeup Removing Moisturizing Cleansing Jelly, Top Japanese Makeup Remover, Gentle Skin Cleanser, Mild Floral Fragrance, Non-Greasy, 7.8 Ounce Bioré ['Bioré J-Beauty Makeup Removing Moisturizing Cleansing Jelly is a non-greasy makeup remover that removes dirt and impurities from deep below the surface of your skin. This top Japanese makeup remover glides on gently and leaves no sticky residue. Formulated with conditioning beauty essence, this jelly leaves skin feeling moisturized and free of makeup. Satisfaction Guaranteed. Limitations may apply.'] {'Product Dimensions': '1.56 x 2.5 x 7.25 inches; 10.08 Ounces', 'Item model number': '28077_obs', 'UPC': '019100264557', 'Manufacturer': 'Kao USA Inc.'} First of all, I don’t use to much makeup, no thick layers of foundations. Just some primer, concealer, eyes and mouth.
For me, they worked perfectly! They are pretty wet, so they took off all my makeup easily.
They are small, so if you use more layers of make up you maybe are going to need more than one.
They are soft and have a nice scent.
I have mixed skin and delicate. They did not hurt me, burn me, or leave my skin red.
After using them, my skin feels clean and moisturized. Not greasy or dry.
And they come in a super handy little box, perfect to carry around on your bag. Works great!! lilah b. - Bronzed Beauty Bronzer Duo - b. sunkissed - Multipurpose Bronzer Duo to Highlight + Contour and Blend LILAH B {'Brand': 'LILAH B', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Style': 'Compact', 'Package Dimensions': '3.8 x 3.5 x 1 inches; 0.32 Ounces', 'UPC': '851078006100'} This is beautiful. Not only the box is very nice, but the case is stunning! Looks like a smooth shell. Very luxurious. Perfect as a gift!
It is however, because of the material, like a ceramic or something, very heavy. I think it will not be good as a pret a porter kind of makeup. But perfect for the one you leave on your makeup vanities.
The colors are perfect for my skin tone, I’m like a light brown tone. But I’ve found myself using it more as a eye shadow than bronzer.
The highlighter gives a pop of glow.
No scent on it and it stays perfectly during my days.
Like it. Beautiful! Beautiful case! Magnetic Eyelashes and Magnetic Eyeliner Kit, Magnetic Eyelashes with Eyeliner, 5 Pairs Reusable Magnetic Eyelashes with Tweezer, False Lashes Eyenjoy {'Brand': 'Eyenjoy', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '5.71 x 5.39 x 0.71 inches', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Mounting Type': 'Magnet', 'Product Dimensions': '5.71 x 5.39 x 0.71 inches; 2.12 Ounces', 'UPC': '736067423758'} This was my first attempt to do faux eye lashes. I can not compare to other systems, but I love it! I use the 3 pair from the top. The look was pretty normal. I had to cut a little of them because it was too long for me.
The set comes with 2 eye liner, tweezer and 5 pairs of lashes.
The liner was easy to apply and then the lashes were stuck on it fast and easy.
I went to a barbecue with them and they stay in the entire time.
After, they go out without any pain. The eye liner was a little hard to take off. I use my makeup wipes in a hard way. Haha.
It did not make my sensitive skin hurt or burn.
I love it! Big difference! Argan Magic 100% Pure Argan Oil – Moisturizing Oil that Infuses Skin with Enriched Hydration | Leaves Skin Restored & Refreshed | Non-Greasy | Rich in Vitamin E | Made in USA | Cruelty Free (2 oz) Argan Magic {'Brand': 'Argan Magic', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Active Ingredients': 'Vitamin e', 'Unit Count': '2 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.2 x 1.1 x 1.1 inches; 2 Ounces', 'UPC': '605923474046'} I was hoping more of this oil.
First it does not have any árgan type of scent... on the contrary it smells like fried oil. Not good. It is not super strong scent, but definitely you can smell it.
Second, it does not absorbe fast. I was oily until I fell asleep.
It was lightweight.
I did felt my skin hidrates the next day, but not quite sure if this is better than other oils that I use.
Definitely, I won’t use it, because mainly of the French fries smell. Mmmmm Im not sure... Claw Hair Clips, IKOCO 6 Pack Jaw Clips Stylish Matte Plastic Strong Hold Hair Clamps Box Packaged for Thin Fine Hair with 10Pcs Black Hair ties (2.4Inch) IKOCO {'Brand': 'IKOCO', 'Hair Type': 'Fine', 'Color': 'Green,Grey', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Plastic, Metal, Acrylic', 'Product Dimensions': '6.25 x 4.25 x 2 inches; 5.89 Ounces'} This set comes in a plastic box, nice detail because you can use it for storage.
The clips are bigger than I was expecting, but they are perfect. I have very thin hair and medium length.
I like that they lie flat on my head. So they don’t hurt me if I’m using them for long periods of time.
Lightweight and well made. They feel sturdy.
The set also comes with hair ties, love them! Very soft. They are made on 1 piece of fabric which helps on the hair.
I really like this set.
Recommended. Great set! SOFTACULOUS Foot Peeling Mask Booties – 2 Pairs, Baby Soft Skin in 7 Days SuiteMade {'Package Dimensions': '7.87 x 5.91 x 1.14 inches; 4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'STM-FMP-LAV', 'UPC': '734038263785'} A couple of times during the year I get my heels very very dry.
I ordered this mask and it was great!
It start peeling around day 5-6.. and it was soo relaxing!!! Just like when I was little and we use glue on our hands! Haha..
Well, my feet are soft and almost all the dryness got out.
Easy to use.
No strong scent.
It did not make my skin red or itchy.
Love it! Recommended. Soft feet! MU TENUTO Berceuse Water Gel Cream (2.36 fl. oz.) - Hypoallergenic Refreshing & Hydrating Facial Gel Cream with Natural Ingredients, Night Skin Care by Classical Music, Comfortable Lavender Fragrances MU TENUTO {'Brand': 'MU TENUTO', 'Scent': 'Lavender', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Unit Count': '2.36 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '3.35 x 2.99 x 2.72 inches; 6.91 Ounces'} I wanted to love it, but i just can’t.
It smell good, it spread easily. You don’t need too much of it for the entire face. My skin did feel moisturized after using it BUT i just can’t stand the stickiness!!!! I tried with several amounts of it and i could not sleep at all because of the sticky feeling. It was too much. It did not absorb into my skin. Obviously every skin is different, mine is sensitive and dry.
The consistency is like a heavy gel.
So, for me is a BIG no, but i will use it during summer after sun tanning, before shower. I can see that would be best for me....i even think it will work great if i storage it in the fridge before using it... just like a cooling gel. Definitely not for every night Veencys - Hair Straightening Treatment - Brazilian Keratin - Chocolate Treatment -Maximum Strength-Ideal for Moisturizing Eliminates Frizzy Hairs Smooth Hair 32oz (946 ml) Veencys {'Package Dimensions': '9.84 x 3.15 x 3.11 inches; 2.34 Pounds'} First, this treatment is profesional use… I can seee that because definitely I couldn’t do it by myself! It is not a simple or fast process.
The liquid has a very strong chocolate scent which I prefer over any more chemical scent.
You need to follow the instructions very well.
I have very thin, short natural wavy hair and I think we did something wrong along the way… hahaha…
Although my hair does feel softer and shinier. But I don’t have a “Brazilian straight”.
The liquid is chocolate also in color but I did not see any difference in my own hair. So it did not dye it.
Is a good product, and if you are like me, not super handy with brush and hair dryer, you better ask for help so you can follow through the steps. Chocolate scent… huge bottle Oreola Fish Line Hair Extensions Real Human Hair Natural Black Wire Hair Extensions Straight Hairpiece for Women #1B 20inch 120G Oreola {'Brand': 'Oreola', 'Color': '#1B Natural Black', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '20 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Package Dimensions': '7.87 x 3.94 x 1.97 inches; 8 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Oreola'} This is a great option to the expensive hand tied extensions, plus you can put them in and off when you want.
The hair is soft and shinny, feel very good quality. It hold very good straightening or curling iron.
The weft has clippers so it can be more secure to the head. And the wire is adjustable to the size and shape of your head.
It is not extremely heavy, but you can feel it when you first put it on, but after a couple of hours you don’t even remember is there.
I saw quite a few videos to install it correctly and that made the difference so it can be completely invisible.
Comfortable to wear, the weft is not itchy.
The pack comes with the hair in a dust bag, a comb and a hair pin.
Recommended. Super soft and shinny hair
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Usage:** The user actively seeks practical beauty accessories and routines, with a marked interest in innovative hair care products. Their recent experience with hair extensions reflects a willingness to engage with complex beauty solutions, particularly those emphasizing softness and quality.

- **Material Preference:** They prioritize soft, gentle materials that are suitable for sensitive skin, extending this concern to hair care. Their positive interaction with human hair extensions highlights their preference for natural textures.

- **Aesthetic Taste:** The user enjoys playful and nostalgic designs in beauty tools, valuing those that combine aesthetic appeal with functionality. Their recent acquisition suggests an appreciation for quality crafting in hair products.

- **Quality Expectation:** They display a discerning eye for quality and usability. Their detailed feedback on comfort and performance indicates that texture, ease of use, and overall experience are crucial to their satisfaction.

- **Practicality:** The user favors tools that integrate seamlessly into their care routines, seeking versatile and easy-to-apply solutions that enhance their beauty regimen.

- **Multi-functionality:** They are drawn to products with multiple uses, emphasizing the importance of positive sensory experiences, particularly with texture and after-feel. Their approach reflects a thoughtful consideration of comfort and aesthetic enjoyment in both skin and hair care.

Overall, the user prioritizes comfort, usability, and a luxurious sensory experience while maintaining high standards for product performance across their evolving personal care routine.
